overview:
Jos van Doorn is an AutoLISP programmer. He has been programming in AutoLISP for more than 25 years. He is very experienced.

He is working for engineering firms and architects that want to make their AutoCAD faster. They do not want to wait for hours for their drawings.

Jos is also giving AutoLISP courses. He teaches people how programming in AutoLISP is done. Those people are most of the time staff of his customers.
